title: Move customer name & mobile form to app start screen

requirements.text: Remove the Customer and Mobile columns from the DoorList table. The door entries table should only show Sr, Size, and pricing columns â€” no customer/mobile data displayed per row.

quotes: Remove form here add in starting

acceptanceCriteria: DoorList table no longer renders Customer or Mobile columns
Table header row does not include Customer or Mobile headings
Each door entry row only shows Sr, Size, and coating price columns

requirements.text: Add a customer info entry screen at the very beginning of the app flow (before the door entry form). This screen should collect the customer name and mobile number with two text input fields and a 'Continue' or 'Start' button. Only after submitting this screen should the user proceed to the door dimension entry and door list view.

quotes: Remove form here add in starting

acceptanceCriteria: On first load, a customer info screen is shown with fields for customer name and mobile number
User cannot reach the door entry form until they submit the customer info screen
Submitting the customer info screen stores the name and mobile in app state and navigates to the door entry / door list view
The stored customer name and mobile number are still passed through to the quotation view and WhatsApp share output

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
Customer name and mobile number must still be available in the quotation/WhatsApp output
nonGoals: Changing backend schema or Motoko actor
Redesigning the door entry form layout
